recipes.title: The Perfect Hamburger
ingredients: Sliced tomato, Onion, Pickles and condiments, optional
recipes.directions: 1)In a large bowl, combine egg and seasonings. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into four 3/4-in.-thick patties. 2) Grill, covered, on a greased grill rack over medium heat or broil 4 in. from the heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until a thermometer reads 160Â° and juices run clear. Serve on buns, with toppings as desired. Yield: 4 servings.
